original_text: Manasseh was twelve years old when he began to reign, and he reigned fifty-five years in Jerusalem.
korean_text: 므낫세가 왕위에 오를 때에 나이가 십이 세라 예루살렘에서 오십오 년 동안 다스리며

sentences.original_text: Manasseh was twelve years old when he began to reign
sentences.korean_translation: 므낫세가 통치를 시작할 때에 나이가 열두 살이었고

sentences.original_text: and he reigned fifty-five years in Jerusalem
